actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to correct the current disproportional seating on the committees and subcommittees of the U.S. House of Representatives, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires each House committee (except the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct) and subcommittee to be constituted in a ratio proportionate to the membership of the two political parties in the House. Requires, where practicable, the committee staffs to reflect such ratio.

titles.title: A resolution to correct the current disproportional seating on the committees and subcommittees of the U.S. House of Representatives, and for other purposes.
